messages.text:
Hey team, *<@U0MBX09UZ>* needs support! :goodchop_fan:Please check the details.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Priority:* Medium :large_yellow_circle: 
*Topic:* Bug Report


:mag: *Issue reported:*
your "use-free-addons-by-voucher-code" operation is spamming traces


:footprints: *Steps to reproduce:*
<https://ui.honeycomb.io/hellofresh/datasets/traces-frontend-live/result/GAzpbaiKnCx?vs=hideCompare&tab=overview>

_thread_replies.text:
Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible :blobthumbsup:

Meanwhile, please check our <https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TNV/pages/4049372305/How+tos|How-To section>. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

elements.text: Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible
. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

_thread_replies.text: if you don't mind, I will remove this span - you can create a PR fixing it once you have time

elements.text: if you don't mind, I will remove this span - you can create a PR fixing it once you have time

_thread_replies.text: my guess is that you don't use this data anyway, otherwise you would have noticed that it's totally inaccurate  and that we have sessions with hundreds of this duplicate span

elements.text: my guess is that you don't use this data anyway, otherwise you would have noticed that it's totally inaccurate  and that we have sessions with hundreds of this duplicate span

_thread_replies.text: it's the 9th most collected span in the website, with 6.3 million spans per day, and an average of 100 spans per session

elements.text: it's the 9th most collected span in the website, with 6.3 million spans per day, and an average of 100 spans per session

_thread_replies.text:
Thank you for reporting Fede!
Yes, please remove the span. I will discuss it with the team to understand what we wanted to track here and if we really need it.

elements.text:
Thank you for reporting Fede!
Yes, please remove the span. I will discuss it with the team to understand what we wanted to track here and if we really need it.

_thread_replies.text: thanks!
<https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/54999>
I remember I pointed it out to creator of the span: <https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C03DDD4R537/p1736526947671819?thread_ts=1736365589.730599&cid=C03DDD4R537> :disappointed:

elements.text: Hey Alex, we are sending the span around 300 times per user journey (in the funnel only). In 24 hours, we sent
spans, which sounds huge for MR. Shouldn't we send the span only once per user/page?

attachments.fallback: [January 10th, 2025 8:35 AM] crui: Hey Alex, we are sending the span around 300 times per user journey (in the funnel only). In 24 hours, we sent <https://ui.honeycomb.io/hellofresh/datasets/traces-frontend-live/result/D7usQn3m51y|3 million> spans, which sounds huge for MR. Shouldn't we send the span only once per user/page?
attachments.text: Hey Alex, we are sending the span around 300 times per user journey (in the funnel only). In 24 hours, we sent <https://ui.honeycomb.io/hellofresh/datasets/traces-frontend-live/result/D7usQn3m51y|3 million> spans, which sounds huge for MR. Shouldn't we send the span only once per user/page?

elements.text: I remember I pointed it out to creator of the span:

_thread_replies.text: hi team, I just found another one of these spans

elements.text: hi team, I just found another one of these spans

_thread_replies.text: it was added 3 weeks ago
`operation.free-addons-operations`

we have users with thousands of these spans per session
<https://ui.honeycomb.io/hellofresh/datasets/traces-frontend-live/result/CbNBaiL6jFb?vs=hideCompare&tab=overview>

elements.text: we have users with thousands of these spans per session

_thread_replies.text: we should not be creating spans inside hooks like that

elements.text: we should not be creating spans inside hooks like that

_thread_replies.text: <@U0251UW1YUE> can you please take a look when you have some time?

elements.text: can you please take a look when you have some time?

_thread_replies.text: sure! will check later today!
CR pls <https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/55187>
thanks bolo

messages.text:
Hey team, *<@UJ182DUEN>* needs support! :goodchop_fan:Please check the details.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Priority:* Medium :large_yellow_circle: 
*Topic:* CCM / Menu / AddOns / Menu Replacement


:mag: *Issue reported:*
This night we got some KRS alerts where some customers didn’t have their selection propagated because some indexes were missing for some weeks
The complete list of cuts, subscriptions and weeks will be added to the thread


:footprints: *Steps to reproduce:*
N/A

elements.text:
This night we got some KRS alerts where some customers didn’t have their selection propagated because some indexes were missing for some weeks
The complete list of cuts, subscriptions and weeks will be added to the thread

_thread_replies.text:
Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible :blobthumbsup:

Meanwhile, please check our <https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TNV/pages/4049372305/How+tos|How-To section>. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

elements.text: Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible
. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

_thread_replies.text:
This is a CSV with all subscriptions, week, the error from MSS and the selection they made
It seems like indexes 368 and 369 are the ones missing
In total you have 47 affected subscriptions and the weeks with wrong menus are 2025-W38 and 2025-W40

elements.text:
This is a CSV with all subscriptions, week, the error from MSS and the selection they made
It seems like indexes 368 and 369 are the ones missing
In total you have 47 affected subscriptions and the weeks with wrong menus are 2025-W38 and 2025-W40

_thread_replies.text:
What Good Chop needs to check:
• Confirm that these are the indexes missing in the menus for the mentioned weeks
• Why are they missing? Is that a menu misconfig?
• After that’s done, the selection should be retried (we can do that work)

elements.text: What Good Chop needs to check:
Confirm that these are the indexes missing in the menus for the mentioned weeks
Why are they missing? Is that a menu misconfig?
After that’s done, the selection should be retried (we can do that work)
